select seq_free.nextval from dual
insert into free_board values(#{freeNo},#{freeTitle},#{freeName},0,#{freeContent},sysdate,#{userId},0)
mapper.update: update free_board set free_title=#{freeTitle}, free_content=#{freeContent} where free_no=#{freeNo}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, b.* from (select free_no ,free_title , free_name , free_hits, free_content , free_date ,user_id , free_reple_cnt from free_board where user_id=#{userId} order by free_no desc) b where rownum<=#{end}) where rnum>=#{start}
select free_no ,free_title ,free_name ,free_hits ,free_content , free_date ,user_id, free_reple_cnt from free_board where free_no=#{freeNo}
select count(*) from free_board where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.update: update free_board set free_hits=free_hits+1 where free_no=#{freeNo}
mapper.insert:
select seq_free_reple.nextval from dual
insert into free_reple values(#{freeRepleNo},#{freeRepleName},#{freeRepleContent},sysdate,#{freeNo})
mapper.update: update free_reple set free_reple_content=#{freeRepleContent}, free_reple_date=sysdate where free_reple_no=#{freeRepleNo}
update free_board set free_reple_cnt=free_reple_cnt+1 where free_no=#{free_no}
update free_board set free_reple_cnt=free_reple_cnt-1 where free_no=#{free_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from free_reple where free_no=#{free_no}
